casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
EDWARDS. No. S230753. Supreme Court of California Jan. 27, 2016.

*522CANTIL-SAKAUYE, C.J., WERDEGAR, CHIN, CORRIGAN, LIU, CUÉLLAR, and KRUGER, JJ., concur.

The petitions for review are granted.

Further action in this matter is deferred pending our decision in People v. Sanchez, S216681 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
